attributes.action: Backdate the Stamp Duty holiday to start of the financial year
attributes.additional_details: The government should backdate the amount of money that has been paid in stamp duty so we are given the same opportunity as others but I g a house in 2020/2021.
attributes.background: Covid has hit everyone hard financially and yet some people have moved house regardless of the financial uncertainty & stimulated the housing. Market already.  I am asking the government to backdate the Stamp Duty holiday to all individuals who purchased a house since April 1st 2020.

rejection.details:
We think this petition is very similar

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/330868
